name: ToMuchHamburgers
description:
Game developed in 3 hours for trijam-212 gamejam.

https://itch.io/jam/trijam-212

The theme of the game jam was "TOO MUCH". 

Our game falls into the theme allowing to assembly a burger with a very large number of ingredients.

WASD to move. Space to dash.

By Stanislav Datsyuk, Aleksei Akhmanov and Nikita Isaev (https://www.artstation.com/softpire).
